Biondo Contracting Offers 12 Months "Same as Cash&quo

East Brunswick, New Jersey, September 14, 2012: Biondo Contracting is pleased to announce it is running special financing for the summer and fall of 2012. This special provides customers with the opportunity to finance all their roofing and siding service needs for a full 12 months without having to make any down payment. Customers will be able to make payments throughout the year with no interest, helping homeowners afford the work they need more easily.

Biondo Contracting provides a wide range of services relating to roofing and siding projects, specializing in residential roofing needs. With the "Same as Cash" financing options, homeowners are able to request the repairs they need without having to worry about coming up with the financing or payment upfront. Biondo Contracting will provide the work, allowing customers to make payments as they can over the year following the work. This helps homeowners who would otherwise be unable to repair their home to get the help they need.

The ability to make any size payment or no payment at all means homeowners can get the work done now and pay for it later, allowing them to wait for a tax return or to save up for the repairs without having to wait for the repairs at the same time.

Any homeowner in New Jersey who needs any services for roofing or siding can find out more about the "Same as Cash" financing offer by Biondo Contracting, which ends September 31, 2012, by visiting the Biondo Contracting website or by calling 1-732-257-2926.

About Biondo Contracting: Biondo Contracting, founded by Sam Biondo, who has 28 years of experience in roofing, offers a variety of roofing and siding services to residents in the East Brunswick, New Jersey, area. The company prides itself on offering affordable services to homeowners, helping them achieve the repairs and upgrades they desire. With the special financing offers the company runs, homeowners are able to fix up their homes without worrying about the inability to pay for the repairs. With Biondo Contracting, homeowners can feel confident in the experience and knowledge of all workers who work on their homes.

Company: Biondo Contracting
Address: 163 Fresh Ponds Road
City: New Brunswick
State: NJ
Zip code: 08816
Telephone number: 1-732-257-2926
Cell phone number: 1-732-718-1901
Fax number: 1-732-297-6866
Email address: info@biondoroofing.com

Biondo Contracting Provides 0% Financing

New Brunswick, New Jersey, October 2, 2012: Biondo Contracting is pleased to announce it offers 0% financing for those who need work done on their roof or siding of their homes. This financing offer makes these projects more affordable for homeowners, allowing them to finance the work without worrying about paying more for the work due to high interest rates. The ability to finance the work with no interest ensures more people are able to get the work done on their homes so they don't risk further damage due to incomplete repairs.

For those who qualify, Biondo Contracting provides 0% financing for five years, helping homeowners spread out their payments for a longer period of time. Depending on the extent of the repairs, paying upfront can be out of the question. Paying interest on that amount over a longer period of time can make financing that repair difficult to accept. With Biondo Contracting, homeowners can make those extended payments without worrying about spending more in the end. The low payments will make the repairs more affordable.

Biondo contracting focuses on providing customers with the highest level of service and workmanship to ensure all homeowners have a home they can be proud of. Their many payment options can make paying for those repairs easier for everyone.

Any homeowners who are looking for roofing and siding repairs and installation and need affordable financing options can find out more about this 0% financing offer by visiting the Biondo Contracting website or by calling 1-732-257-2926.

About Biondo Contracting: Biondo Contracting is a full-service roofing and siding company, founded by Sam Biondo, that provide homeowners with the ability to finance the work their home needs to look beautiful and be functional as well. With over 20 years in the New Brunswick area, customers can feel confident in the work Biondo Contracting does. They hire only the best, providing experienced workers. They don't subcontract their work like many other companies do. Their goal is to provide quality work that fits into every homeowner's budget.

Company: Biondo Contracting
Address: 163 Fresh Ponds Road
City: New Brunswick
State: NJ
Zip code: 08816
Telephone number: 1-732-257-2926
Cell phone number: 1-732-718-1901
Fax number: 1-732-297-6866
Email address: info@biondoroofing.com

McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley Boasts over $5-Million in Rec

Wall Township, New Jersey, October 12, 2012: McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley is pleased to announce they have won more than $5-million in recoveries since January 2012, providing their clients with great success in their cases against their employers. With more than $27-million in recoveries for the last five years combined, they are on pace to surpass the numbers attained in previous years. The law firm proudly represents plaintiffs in various cases regarding employment law, helping employees get what they deserve from current and past employers in cases, such as pregnancy discrimination, age discrimination, whistleblowing and unlawful retaliation.

In addition to winning these settlements for their clients, the lawyers at McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley have been awarded for their work in the area. The firm itself has been named one of the best law firms in employment law by U.S. News and World Reports. Their peers have also named each of the three lawyers Best Lawyer. Mr. McMoran is a member of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and has been placed on the Top 100 Super Lawyers in New Jersey list twice.

With this combination of success and recognition, McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley proves to be one of the most successful employment law firms in the area, providing their clients with results.

Anyone who is interested in learning more about this prestigious law firm can learn more by visiting the McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley website or by calling their offices at 1-800-292-6640.

About McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley: McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley is an employment law firm in the New Jersey area, with offices in Wall Township, Iselin and New York City. Their three lawyers have been serving the area and getting results for wronged employees for the past five years, earning more than $27-million in settlements for their clients. In addition to this great success, all three lawyers have received distinguished awards in their field, making them an excellent choice for their clients.

Company: McMoran, O'Connor and Bramley
Address: Bldg. D, Suite D-1, 2399 Highway 34
City: Wall Township
State: NJ
Zip code: 08736
Telephone number: 1-732-223-7711
Toll-free number: 1-800-292-6640

Powerhouse Internet Marketing Is Toronto's #1 Search Market

Richmond Hill, Ontario, Canada, October 18, 2012: Powerhouse Internet Marketing is pleased to announce they are Toronto's #1 search marketing firm. They strive to provide their clients with the utmost in the latest search marketing strategies to help their websites rank better on the search engines and bring in a more targeted group of visitors that are more likely to turn into customers for the company. Many companies don't know what is necessary to do this for themselves, making finding a company that specializes in Internet marketing a critical element to success in today's technological world.

One of the biggest reasons Powerhouse Internet Marketing ranks so well as Toronto's leading search marketing firm is their industry leading client dashboard. This dashboard allows all their clients to see exactly what is going on with their marketing efforts. However, this isn't the only thing that makes this marketing firm a top choice of many companies.

When a company seeks help with Internet marketing, specifically search marketing, they want results that speak for themselves. At Powerhouse Internet Marketing, they offer the most technologically advanced tactics to make the most of their client's websites, including search engine optimization, keyword research, pay-per-click marketing and more. They provide each client with a fully customized solution that will allow each website to see the success it desires.

About Powerhouse Internet Marketing: Powerhouse Internet Marketing is a full-service Internet marketing firm that provides their clients with a long list of services that are meant to increase their web presence for better results. Websites are a critical element to success in today's technological world. Without a solid Internet presence, many businesses will fail. Powerhouse Internet Marketing makes use of some of the top Internet marketing tactics, including SEO, pay-per-click advertising, web design and social media marketing, among others.

Company: Powerhouse Internet Marketing
Address: 604 Edward Avenue, Unit 14
City: Richmond Hill
Province: Ontario
Country: Canada
Zip code: L4C9Y7
Telephone number: 1-888-306-8259
Fax number: 1-905-918-0251
Email address: info@powerhouseinternetmarketing.com
